0000111100010101 0110011110011101 1 -> sum: 0111011010110011, cout: 0
1101011111000000 1001001010100010 0 -> sum: 0110101001100010, cout: 1
1010011100101011 1110100100111110 0 -> sum: 1001000001101001, cout: 1
0011101001010010 0100000001110101 1 -> sum: 0111101011001000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
